strapiPost.title: The Momentary Shares It's 2022 Spring Guide
strapiPost.content:
In preparation for spring, The Momentary released its Spring Guide showcasing new exhibitions, live music, concerts, and performances. 

  • Spring cleaning: All the new in-store doesn't mean the old has to go. In Some Form or Fashion will have its last day at the Momentary on March 27. The galleries will largely be empty from March 29 to early May due to the new line-up. 
  • Outdoors: Live music from a Scottish rock composer to the Fresh Grass Festival is scheduled for this spring, and the outdoor Rode Bar is awaiting your patronage along with High South on a Roll food truck right next to the Momentary green.

Learn more about the Momentary grounds and upcoming events HERE.
